name: Hide And Squeak (maddie)
description:
Hide and Squeak, A single-player cat-and-mouse game where you try your best to catch a gang of tax-evading mice as an IRS agent cat. The mice intend to escape with their money, but you will not let that happen, as you follow the money trail to capture the evil mice once and for all.

WASD controls are the default (adjustable to arrow keys in settings).
